section.title: Quota
section.p: Eucalyptus extends the IAM policy language to add quota enforcement. The extensions to support quota enforcement are:

ul.li: A new value for the Effect element of a permission statement in a policy: Use “Limit” to indicate that this statement is a quota statement.
